nodes.text: The Dreadnaught analog, sometimes known simply as a Dreadnaught, was a type of Yuuzhan Vong capital ship.

The term belonged to the pattern of warship designations devised by the opponents of the Yuuzhan Vong. Whatever the exact meaning of the term, Dreadnaught analogs were capable of inflicting serious damage on a Star Destroyer like the Mon Mothma, and were clearly considered front-line capitals ships by the invaders. As such, ships of this type fought at the battle of the Duro system and the Battle of Bilbringi.
